bonus.value: Increase frost ATK by 8%/10%/12%/15% for 10 seconds when switching between frost weapons. This set's effects work with others, but only the set with the highest star rating's effect will take effect.
When unleashing a frost domain with the weapon "Balmung," enemies within the frost domain receive frost damage equal to 55%/65%/75%/85% of ATK every second.
